title: Get YYMM format from the EnteredTime context object in Step Function
description: Using intrinsic functions get an item formatted YYMM from the context object EnteredTime from a Step Function state machine. In this way you don't need to use a Lambda function to get that item

introBox.headline: How it works
text: Using Step Function intrinsic functions you can get from the context object EnteredTime an item formatted like YYMM. This way you don't need to use a lambda function to produce that. This is using many nested functions to parse the EnteredTime variable that looks like this: 2019-03-26T20:14:13.192Z. First it splits it using the T and then it gets the first two element from the first array.

snippets.title: Use intrinsic functions to get an item formatted YYMM from the context object EnteredTime
